column5: I've just finished going through parts of the MNRF regs for fishing for 2021. I'm a bit confused and surprised. My focus is on Eagle Lake. On the west end of Eagle Lake are the seasons? Smallmouth and largemouth bass year round? Northerns year round? Walleyes, 3rd Saturday in May? This differs a lot from Minnesota, yeah. Is that expected to be the same for 2022?
From my understanding, there will be no major changes next year.

No changes that I've heard of. Specific to Eagle there are no largemouth. No season on the smallmouth but there is a time frame (spring) where the limit (if you wanted to keep some) was half and the fish have to be under 13 inches (approx)....basically protecting the spawning female fish.
